text:
Los Angeles - Remote or Onsite - http://purpledelivery.com

Small, funded startup in Beverly Hills. Onsite is a major plus, but remote may be okay. Looking to hire at least one developer. Any skill level is welcome to apply.

Our tech stack: Clojure backend, CoffeeScript mobile app on Sencha Touch framework + PhoneGap. May eventually move to React Native.

Email me at: chris at purpledelivery.com
